chapters.name: I. Journery's Beginning
lines: ~~üåÑ Exploration & adventure~~
Gather resources to build a [house](House) with a [table](Tables), a [chair](Chairs), and a [door](Doors) for the {npc Guide}(Guide) to move in
Gather ores to improve your [tools](Tools), [armor](Armor) and [weapons](Weapons) with [silver](Silver_Ore)/[tungsten](Tungsten_Ore)
Explore [caverns](Cavern), find some [Life Crystals](Life_Crystal), and **consume a maximum of 4 of them for now**
Collect some [Fallen Stars](Fallen_Star) to craft some [Mana Crystals](Mana_Crystal) and use them to increase your mana to 100
Buy a [Piggy Bank](Piggy_Bank) from the {npc Merchant}(Merchant) and put your coins in it to save them from being lost on death
Craft a [Grappling Hook](Hooks#Grappling_Hook) to help you navigate the world more easily
Craft some [Spelunker Potions](Spelunker_Potion) to illuminates nearby ores, gems, chests and other valuable objects
Upgrade your gear with [gold](Gold_Ore)/[platinum](Platinum_Ore)
Increase your maximum mana to 200 if needed
Increase your health points to 200 by using a fifth [Life Crystal](Life_Crystal)
Defeat the bosses (see below)
Unlock the NPCs (see below)
~~üßô NPC unlocks~~
Build a house for each of the following NPCs
{npc Nurse}(Nurse): use a [Life Crystal](Life_Crystal)
{npc Merchant}(Merchant): get 50 silver [coins](Coins)
{npc Demolitionist}(Demolitionist): get an [explosive](Explosives)
{npc Dye Trader}(Dye_Trader): find a [dye plant](Plants#Dye_plants)
{npc Stylist}(Stylist): free the NPC trapped in a [spiders nest](Spider_Nest)
{npc Angler}(Angler): talk to the sleeping NPC in the ocean biome
{npc Arms Dealer}(Arms_Dealer): find at least one [bullet](Bullets) or a bullet-firing [gun](Guns)
{npc Zoologist}(Zoologist): have at least 10% of the [bestiary](Bestiary) filled (54 entries)
{npc Dryad}(Dryad): defeat the {boss Eye of Cthulhu}(Eye_of_Cthulhu)
~~üíÄ Boss fights~~
üõ°Ô∏è Gear up for the next fights ([weapons](Weapons), [potions](Potions) & [armor](Armor))
{boss King Slime}(King_Slime): summon the boss by using a [Slime Crown](Slime_Crown), **or** by killing 150 [slimes](Slimes) during the {event Slime Rain}(Slime_Rain) event
{boss Eye of Cthulhu}(Eye_of_Cthulhu): unlock the boss spawning by having at least 200 HP and 4 town NPCs **or** by using a [Suspicious Looking Eye](Suspicious_Looking_Eye)
Farm the {boss Eye of Cthulhu}(Eye_of_Cthulhu) for [demonite](Demonite_Ore)/[crimtane](Crimtane_Ore) ores and upgrade your gear
~~üìÖ Event triggers~~
{event Blood Moon}(Blood_Moon): use your first [Life Crystal](Life_Crystal) to unlock the event

chapters.name: II. The Corruption
lines: ~~üåÑ Exploration & adventure~~
Get some [Purification Powder](Purification_Powder) by crafting it or by buying it from the {npc Dryad}(Dryad)
Defeat {boss Eater of Worlds}(Eater_of_Worlds)/{boss Brain of Cthulhu}(Brain_of_Cthulhu) to trigger a [meteor crash](Meteorite_(biome)) (50% chance) the next midnight
Mine completely the [meteorite](Meteorite) and upgrade your gear
Buy [Rocket Boots](Rocket_Boots) from the {npc Goblin Tinkerer}(Goblin_Tinkerer)
Upgrade the weapons and gear [rarity](Rarity) by reforging them at the {npc Goblin Tinkerer}(Goblin_Tinkerer)
Defeat the boss (see below)
Unlock the NPCs (see below)
Destroy all [Shadow Orbs](Shadow_Orb)/[Crimson Hearts](Crimson_Heart) to farm the boss and meteorites
Upgrade your gear with [demonite](Demonite)/[crimtane](Crimtane)
~~üßô NPC unlocks~~
{npc Painter}(Painter): have at least 8 town NPCs
{npc Golfer}(Golfer): talk to him in the [Underground Desert](Underground_Desert)
{npc Goblin Tinkerer}(Goblin_Tinkerer): defeat the {event Goblin Army}(Goblin_Army) and find the lost NPC in [caverns](Cavern)
{npc Tavernkeep}(Tavernkeep): defeat {boss Eater of Worlds}(Eater_of_Worlds)/{boss Brain of Cthulhu}(Brain_of_Cthulhu) and find the Unconscious Man NPC in any layer of the world
~~üíÄ Boss fights~~
üõ°Ô∏è Gear up for the next fights ([weapons](Weapons), [potions](Potions) & [armor](Armor))
Prepare a large and flat area at the surface for the next boss fight
{boss Eater of Worlds}(Eater_of_Worlds)/{boss Brain of Cthulhu}(Brain_of_Cthulhu): destroy a third [Shadow Orb](Shadow_Orb)/[Crimson Heart](Crimson_Heart) to summon the boss, then defeat it
~~üìÖ Event triggers~~
{event Goblin Army}(Goblin_Army): destroy at least one [Shadow Orb](Shadow_Orb)/[Crimson Heart](Crimson_Heart) and have at least 200 HP (triggers only on daytime)
Get some mobility equipment ([Rocket Boots](Rocket_Boots), [Grappling Hook](Hooks#Grappling_Hook), [Mounts](Mounts), etc.) and craft 101 [torches](Torches)

{event The Torch God}(The_Torch_God): in the [Underground](Underground) layer, prepare a large squared area and place 101 torches in it to trigger the event. Surviving the event will reward you with the [Torch God's Favor](Torch_God's_Favor)

chapters.name: III. The Dungeon
lines: ~~üåÑ Exploration & adventure~~
Craft a [Phaseblade](Phaseblades) (15 meteorite bars and 10 gems)
Isolate the NPCs from the corruption by creating a [6-blocks wide trench](Guide:Maintaining_world_purity#Pre-Hardmode) around their houses
Upgrade your [Rocket Boots](Rocket_Boots) and the other accesories at [Tinkerer's Workshop](Tinkerer's_Workshop) if possible
Defeat the bosses (see below)
Unlock the NPCs (see below)
Explore the [dungeon](Dungeon) completely: open a maximum of golden chests, collect an [Alchemy Table](Alchemy_Table) and a [Bewitching Table](Bewitching_Table)
~~üßô NPC unlocks~~
{npc Witch Doctor}(Witch_Doctor): defeat the {boss Queen Bee}(Queen_Bee)
{npc Clothier}(Clothier): defeat the {boss Skeletron}(Skeletron)
{npc Mechanic}(Mechanic): talk to the Bound Mechanic in the dungeon
{npc Party Girl}(Party_Girl): have at least 14 town NPCs
~~üíÄ Boss fights~~
üõ°Ô∏è Gear up for the next fights ([weapons](Weapons), [potions](Potions) & [armor](Armor))
Find a [giant hive](Bee_Hive_(biome)) in the jungle biome
{boss Queen Bee}(Queen_Bee): destory the hive [larva](Larva) to summon the boss, then defeat her
{boss Skeletron}(Skeletron): talk to the {npc Old Man}(Old_Man) at the dungeon entrance **at night** to summon the boss, then defeat it
~~üìÖ Event triggers~~

Prepare a [large and flat area at the surface](Old_One's_Army#Terrain_requirements) (124 blocks), summon some [sentries](Ballista_sentry_summons) and put an [Eternia Crystal Stand](Eternia_Crystal_Stand) in the middle of it
{event Old One's Army}(Old_One's_Army): put an [Eternia Crystal](Eternia_Crystal) in the [Eternia Crystal Stand](Eternia_Crystal_Stand) and survive until wave 5

chapters.name: IV. The Hell
chapters.notes: The world will now enter Hardmode introducing new and powerful monsters and ores. Corruption will also spread much faster.
lines: ~~üåÑ Exploration & adventure~~
Craft an [Obsidian Skull](Obsidian_Skull) (20 [obsidian](Obsidian) (immunizes against fire damage)
Craft some [Obsidian Skin Potions](Obsidian_Skin_Potion) (immunizes against lava damage)
Go to the Hell layer and gather a maximum of [hellstone](Hellstone)

Upgrade your gear with [hellstone](Hellstone): 300 [hellstone](Hellstone) and 100 [obsidian](Obsidian) to upgrade to [Molten armor set](Molten_armor), [tools](Hellstone_Bar#Used_in) and the [Volcano sword](Volcano)
Explore completely the Hell layer: get a [Hellforge](Hellforge), open all [Shadow Chests](Shadow_Chest)
Get some [Guide Voodoo Doll](Guide_Voodoo_Doll) by killing [Voodoo Demons](Voodoo_Demon)
Defeat the bosses (see below)
~~üíÄ Boss fights~~
Prepare a very large and flat area above the lava for the next boss fight
üõ°Ô∏è Gear up for the next fights ([weapons](Weapons), [potions](Potions) & [armor](Armor))
{boss Wall of Flesh}(Wall_of_Flesh) throw a [Guide Voodoo Doll](Guide_Voodoo_Doll) in the lava (to the left to make the boss spawn from the left and vice versa), then defeat the boss
~~üìÖ Event triggers~~
{event Old One's Army}(Old_One's_Army): reach wave 5 if you haven't already

chapters.name: V. The Hardmode
lines: ~~üåÑ Exploration & adventure~~
Farm the {boss Wall of Flesh}(Wall_of_Flesh) as many times as necessary to get the [Pwnhammer](Pwnhammer) and the [Emblems](Emblem)
Destroy the [altars](Altars) in corrupted biomes with the Pwnhammer to spawn new ores
Explore the undergrounds and gather some [cobalt](Cobalt_Ore)/[palladium](Palladium_Ore)
Upgrade your gear and tools with [cobalt](Cobalt_Ore)/[palladium](Palladium_Ore)
Upgrade your gear and tools with [mythril](Mythril_Ore)/[orichalcum](Orichalcum_Ore)
Upgrade your gear and tools with [adamantite](Adamantite_Ore)/[titanium](Titanium_Ore)
Get a [Gelatin Crystal](Gelatin_Crystal) in the [Underground Hallows](Underground_Hallow)
Defeat the bosses (see below)
Unlock the NPCs (see below)
~~üßô NPC unlocks~~
{npc Wizard}(Wizard): talk to the Bound Wizard in the cavern layer
{npc Tax Collector}(Tax_Collector): convert a [Tortured Soul](Tortured_Soul) in the Hell with some [Purification Powder](Thrown_Powder)
{npc Pirate}(Pirate): defeat the {event Pirate Invasion}(Pirate_Invasion)
~~üíÄ Boss fights~~
{boss Queen Slime}(Queen_Slime): summon the boss with a [Gelatin Crystal](Gelatin_Crystal) in the Hallow biome and defeat her

During the {event Blood Moon}(Blood_Moon) summon mini-bosses {boss Blood Eel}(Blood_Eel) and {boss Dreadnautilus}(Dreadnautilus) by fishing anywhere (fishing at the surface layer is recommended to have enough space to fight)
~~üìÖ Event triggers~~
{event Pirate Invasion}(Pirate_Invasion): occurs randomly after defeating the {boss Wall of Flesh}(Wall_of_Flesh)

chapters.name: VI. The Mechanical Terrors
lines: ~~üíÄ Boss fights~~
üõ°Ô∏è Gear up for the next boss ([weapons](Weapons), [potions](Potions) & [armor](Armor))
{boss The Destroyer}(The_Destroyer): summon the boss with a [Mechanical Worm](Mechanical_Worm) **at night** and defeat it
Farm {boss The Destroyer}(The_Destroyer) to gather a maximum of [hallowed bars](Hallowed_Bar)
Upgrade your armor with [hallowed bars](Hallowed_Bar)
üõ°Ô∏è Gear up for the next boss ([weapons](Weapons), [potions](Potions) & [armor](Armor))
{boss Skeletron Prime}(Skeletron_Prime): summon the boss with a [Mechanical Skull](Mechanical_Skull) **at night** and defeat it
üõ°Ô∏è Gear up for the next boss ([weapons](Weapons), [potions](Potions) & [armor](Armor))
Find some [ranged weapons](Ranged_weapons) and craft some [ammunitions](Ammunition_items) ([Chlorophyte Bullets](Chlorophyte_Bullet) for example)
{boss The Twins}(The_Twins): summon the boss with a [Mechanical Eye](Mechanical_Eye) **at night** and defeat them
~~üåÑ Exploration & adventure~~
Upgrade your [Emblems](Emblem) to [Avenger Emblem](Avenger_Emblem)
Craft a pair of [wings](Wings)
Buy the [Clentaminator](Clentaminator) at the {npc Steampunker}(Steampunker) and [reduce the corruption](Guide:Maintaining_world_purity) if necessary
~~üßô NPC unlocks~~
{npc Steampunker}(Steampunker): defeat at least one [Mechanical Boss](Mechanical_bosses)

chapters.name: VII. The Green Inferno
chapters.notes: Defeating Plantera slows the corruption spread by 50%.
lines: ~~üåÑ Exploration & adventure~~
Find some [Life Fruits](Life_Fruit) in the jungle biome and max out your HP to 500
Upgrade your gear with [chlorophyte](Chlorophyte_Ore)
Upgrade your gear and weapons [rarity](Rarity) by reforging them at the {npc Goblin Tinkerer}(Goblin_Tinkerer)
Go back to the dungeon and farm the hardmode monsters to get new items
~~üßô NPC unlocks~~
{npc Cyborg}(Cyborg): defeat {boss Plantera}(Plantera)
~~üíÄ Boss fights~~
üõ°Ô∏è Gear up for the next boss ([weapons](Weapons), [potions](Potions) & [armor](Armor))
Find the a [Plantera's Bulb](Plantera's_Bulb) in the jungle biome
Find an area open enough to fight next tp the bulb or prepare it
{boss Plantera}(Plantera): destroy the [Plantera's Bulb](Plantera's_Bulb) to summon the boss, then defeat it
~~üìÖ Event triggers~~
{event Old One's Army}(Old_One's_Army): put an [Eternia Crystal](Eternia_Crystal) in the [Eternia Crystal Stand](Eternia_Crystal_Stand) and survive until wave 7
{event Frost Moon}(Frost_Moon): trigger the event **at night** with a [Naughty Present](Naughty_Present) and survive until wave 15

chapters.name: VIII. The Ritual
chapters.notes: At night, summon all Mecanical Bosses and defeat them simultaneously to get a rare achievement.
lines: ~~üåÑ Exploration & adventure~~
Get some [biome keys](Biome_Chests) and open the corresponding [chests](Biome_Chests#Types) in the dungeon
~~üíÄ Boss fights~~
üõ°Ô∏è Gear up for the next boss ([weapons](Weapons), [potions](Potions) & [armor](Armor))
Find the jungle [temple](Temple) entrance and explore it
{boss Golem}(Golem): find a [Lihzahrd Power Cell](Lihzahrd_Power_Cell) in the temple chests, put it in the [Lihzahrd Altar](Lihzahrd_Altar) at the end of the temple to summon the boss, then defeat it
~~üìÖ Event triggers~~
Get 8 [Solar Tablet Fragments](Solar_Tablet_Fragment) found in [Lihzahrd Chests](Lihzahrd_Chest) and craft a [Solar Tablet](Solar_Tablet)
{event Solar Eclipse}(Solar_Eclipse): use the [Solar Tablet](Solar_Tablet) to trigger the event **during the day**
{event Martian Madness}(Martian_Madness): find a [Martian Probe](Martian_Probe) at the surface, approach it to be detected and let it escape to trigger the event
{event Pumpkin Moon}(Pumpkin_Moon): trigger the event **at night** with a [Pumpkin Moon Medallion](Pumpkin_Moon_Medallion) and survive until wave 15

chapters.name: IX. The King of the Oceans
lines: ~~üíÄ Boss fights~~
üõ°Ô∏è Gear up for the next boss ([weapons](Weapons), [potions](Potions) & [armor](Armor))
Capture a [Truffle Worm](Truffle_Worm) with a [Bug Net](Bug_Net) in the [Mushroom biome](Mushroom_biome)
Prepare a large area with multiple levels of [platforms](Platforms) in the [ocean](Ocean) biome
{boss Duke Fishron}(Duke_Fishron): summon the boss by fishing in the ocean with a [Truffle Worm](Truffle_Worm) as bait, then defeat it
Farm {boss Duke Fishron}(Duke_Fishron) to get his wings and powerful weapons
{boss Betsy}(Betsy): defeat the boss after 7th wave of the {event Old One's Army}(Old_One's_Army)
~~üìÖ Event triggers~~
{event Old One's Army}(Old_One's_Army): put an [Eternia Crystal](Eternia_Crystal) in the [Eternia Crystal Stand](Eternia_Crystal_Stand) and survive until the boss
~~üßô NPC unlocks~~

{npc Truffle}(Truffle): make an artificial [Mushroom biome](Mushroom_biome) with at least 200 Mushroom biome blocks (using [Mushroom Grass Seeds](Mushroom_Grass_Seeds) on dirt is good enough) and build a house to attract the NPC
{npc Princess}(Princess): have unlocked all previously mentioned NPCs in your world

chapters.name: X. Journey‚Äôs End
lines: ~~üåÑ Exploration & adventure~~
Upgrade your gear and weapons [rarity](Rarity) by reforging them at the {npc Goblin Tinkerer}(Goblin_Tinkerer)
~~üìÖ Event triggers~~
{event Lunar events}(Lunar_Events): defeat the [Lunatic Cultist](Lunatic_Cultist) at the dungeon entrance to trigger the event
Destroy **3 of the 4** {event Lunar events}(Lunar_Events) [Celestial Pillars](Celestial_Pillars) that appeared in the world
~~üíÄ Boss fights~~
üõ°Ô∏è Gear up for the next boss ([weapons](Weapons), [potions](Potions) & [armor](Armor))
{boss Empress of Light}(Empress_of_Light): summon the boss **at night in the Hallow biome** by killing a [Prismatic Lacewing](Prismatic_Lacewing)
{boss Lunatic Cultist}(Lunatic_Cultist): summon the boss by killing the 4 [Cultists](Cultist) at the dungeon entrance, then defeat it

üõ°Ô∏è Gear up for the last time by taking a lot of [defensive potions](Potions#Buff_potions) and [ranged weapons](Ranged_weapons) (with [Chlorophyte Bullets](Chlorophyte_Bullet) for example) and by upgrading your [accessories](Accessories)
{boss Moon Lord}(Moon_Lord): destroy the forth [Celestial Pillar](Celestial_Pillars) to summon the boss, then defeat him
Farm the {boss Moon Lord}(Moon_Lord) to get powerfull weapons and some [luminite](Luminite) ores by summoning him with a [Celestial Sigil](Celestial_Sigil)
Upgrade your gear with [Nebula](Nebula_Fragment)/[Solar](Solar_Fragment)/[Stardust](Stardust_Fragment)/[Vortex](Vortex_Fragment) fragments and [luminite](Luminite) ores

chapters.name: Post Moon Lord
lines: Upgrade all [accessories](Accessories) and craft a [Cell Phone](Cell_Phone)
Craft the mining mount [Drill Containment Unit](Drill_Containment_Unit)
Reforge all items at the {npc Goblin Tinkerer}(Goblin_Tinkerer) to get the best [rarities](Rarity)
Restart an adventure in [Expert](Expert_Mode) or [Master mode](Master_Mode) to get new items üòè

chapters.name: Seasonal events
lines: ~~üìÖ Event triggers~~
{event Frost Legion}(Frost_Legion): **only during Christmas season** (15-31 december), triggered with a [Snow Globe](Snow_Globe) that can be found in the monsters loot [presents](Presents)
~~üßô NPC unlocks~~
{npc Santa Claus}(Santa_Claus): defeate the {event Frost Legion}(Frost_Legion) is defeated

Wood armor
Rich Mahogany armor
~~Hardmode sets~~
Pearlwood armor
